messages.subject: Re: Re: being home all day with kids
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/6/2003 9:02:12 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I have this hunch that you may be bombarded with offers. I agree, but I d probably take some
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/6/2003 9:02:12 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

>
> A deal! I'll ship tiny babies to someone, if you'll ship them back to me at
> 18 months. You get them back at three. I get them again at 13! <BWG>
>
> ~Kelly
>

I have this hunch that you may be bombarded with offers.

I agree, but I'd probably take some of that wee baby time too. LOVED
breastfeeding and cuddling. On the other hand, the sleep thing would probably really
get to me now.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
